definitions.definition: The mythological Greek warrior who slew the Gorgon Medusa by decapitating her. He married Andromeda after rescuing her from Ceto and founded Mycenae . He was the son of Zeus and Danae .
An autumn constellation of the northern sky, said to resemble the mythical hero . It includes the stars Algenib , Algol , and Mirfak .
The last Antigonid king of Macedonia , Perseus of Macedon.

main_definition: ( Greek mythology ) The mythological Greek warrior who slew the Gorgon Medusa by decapitating her. He married Andromeda after rescuing her from Ceto and founded Mycenae . He was the son of Zeus and Danae .

The last Antigonid king of Macedonia , Perseus of Macedon.
